channel.title: Tor's control port could not be reached!
channel.description:
EROR: Tor bootstrap Result: Tor's control port could not be reached!
(Technical information:) (Code:124) (tor_bootstrap_timeout_type: sigterm) (tor_bootstrap_status: Variable chek_bootstrap_helper_script_output_is empty) (chek_socks_port_open_test: 22) (TorCircuit: not established)

item.title: Tor's control port could not be reached!
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

My question was more related to the potential of having a connection error due to a falsely configured workstation. If I understand you correctly though, the issue happens on the gateway. Are you able to connect to Tor on your host? Also, did you try restarting/reloading your connection? Did you edit torrc in any way? Also, what Hypervisor do you use and how did you set it up?

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Tor's control port could not be reached!
